a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths of combatants due to fighting, disease, and starvation, per 100,000 people. Included are interstate,
intrastate, extrastate, and non-state wars that were ongoing that year.
Data source: Correlates of War - Wars (2020); Population based on various sources (2023)
